messages.subject: unschooling.com message boards
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 11/23/02 11:19:25 PM Central Standard Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 11/23/02 11:19:25 PM Central Standard Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<<
I have tried and tried to post there. It is too confusing for me. Some
posts are old and you have no idea if anyone has responded to you unless you
remember where you posted.... >>

You just have to know how to use them.
The easiest way is to scroll down to the bottom and click on "new messages".
You can then enter your registered name and check all messages since you last
posted OR check all messages for the last day.
That way you will see any and all threads you've recently posted in.
You can also hit "keyword" and have it search for a specific topic or word.


Ren
"The answers aren't important really...
What's important, is knowing all the questions."
-Zilpha Keatley Snyder
Unschooling support at pensacolaunschoolers.com
